Description.description: The description of the build configuration.

Metadata.description: The metadata of the build configuration.

Version.description: The version to be used when building.

RepositoryUrl.description: Specifies the URL to the repository where the source code to the project is.

Commit.description: Specifies the commit of the source code.

IncrementBuildVersion.description: If true, the build revision number is incremented before each build.

BuildBy.description: Specifies the name of the system that assisted in the compilation.

BuildUrl.description: Specifies the URL of where the package can be found.

Options.description: The ALC options for the build configuration.

AlcFolder.description: The path to the ALC folder. If this is not specified, the most recent version of ALC.exe will be used.

OutputFilename.description: If specified, the output file will be written to this file path. This takes precedence over 'OutputFolder'

OutputFolder.description: If specified, the output file will be written to this folder. This is ignored if 'OutputFilename' is specified.

ErrorLog.description: If specified, errors will be logged to this file path.

AssemblyProbingPaths.description: Specifies the assembly probing paths to be used during build.

PackageCacheFolder.description: Indicates the package cache path to use for builds.

WarnAsError.description: Indicates if warnings should be treated as errors.

RuleSet.description: If specified, the ruleset file will be used to alter severity of specific diagnostics.

Target.description: Specify the compilation target.: internal, solution, extension

GenerateCode.description: Specifies whether metadata and code should be generated and packaged in the output file. (Default: Disabled)

GeneratReportLayout.description: Specifies whether report layouts should be created and or updated with the dataset. (Default: Enabled)

HideDiagnosticsFromOutput.description: Specifies whether diagnostic messages are hidden from console output.

Analyzers.description: A list of analyzers to use during build

SourceRepositoryUrl.description: Specifies the URL to the repository where the source code to the project is.

SourceCommit.description: Specifies the commit of the source code.

BuildBy.description: Specifies the name of the system that assisted in the compilation.

BuildUrl.description: Specifies the URL of where the package can be found.

OptionsFile.description: The path to the ALC options file. If this is specified, the Options property is ignored.

IncludePatterns.description: A list of glob patterns of files to include in the build. If this is not specified, all files are included.

ExcludePatterns.description: A list of glob patterns of files to exclude from the build. This is applied after the include patterns.

PreprocessorSymbols.description: Specifies a list of preprocessor symbols to define when building the project.

IncludeTestDependencies.description: Specifies whether test dependencies should be added (=true), removed (=false) or left as is (=null).
